mapper.select: SELECT a.dictionaryid as id, a.title as smName, b.title as parentName from dictionary a JOIN dictionary b ON a.updictionaryid = b.dictionaryid where a.sign = '0'
SELECT a.dictionaryid as id, a.title as smName, b.title as parentName from dictionary a JOIN dictionary b ON a.updictionaryid = b.dictionaryid WHERE a.title LIKE "%"#{smName}"%" AND a.sign = '0'
SELECT a.dictionaryid as id, a.title as smName, b.title as parentName from dictionary a JOIN dictionary b ON a.updictionaryid = b.dictionaryid WHERE a.dictionaryid LIKE #{nodeId}"%" AND a.sign = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary ( dictionaryid, title, updictionaryid, sign, remark ) VALUES ( #{dictionaryid}, #{title}, #{updictionaryid}, 0, #{remark} )
